import React, { Component } from 'react' import TopMenu from '../components/TopMenu' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { getAllPagesAction } from '../actions' import PageCart from '../components/PageCart' class Home extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.getpages() } render() { return (<>

loading

}

Avg. Engagements Rate

3.8%
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ allpages: state.allpages }) const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { getpages: () => dispatch(getAllPagesAction()) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Home)
